name: Distributed Cryptosystem
short_description: In distributed cryptosystem a secret key is distributed among the participants of the system, in the way that only a group of some authorized users can perform any actions related to the secret key. A secret key is used to encrypt a session key, create a digital signature and to certify public keys. The system uses symetric encryption algorithm with a session key to encrypt messages. Shoup’s threshold signature scheme has been used for cooperative signing and also for cooperative decryption.
summary: Distributed cryptosystem based on Shoup’s threshold signature scheme
